name: Saving Nature's Beauty
description:
Everything is dying since the world has been consumed by the darkness. You awake in a dark and ominous forest and see a gentle blue light. Intrigued, you decide to approach, the orb and discover that it can speak to you... 

Uncover the mystery of these strange orbs and save the dying forest.

Credits

Melody Geiger - 3D Character Designer
